config.msgWelcome: Welcome to Jungle Adventure, a classic text adventure.  Navigate your way around the island by typing verb-noun combinations, such as 'go north' or 'take treasure'.  Other useful commands are: 'help', 'inv' (short for inventory), 'look' and 'examine'.

messages.mExamineNotHere: A wise old man once said: 'You cannot examine what you cannot see'.
messages.mConfused: I don't understand what you mean.

locations.name: limbo
locations.description: limbo, a place for things that no longer exist, or don't exist yet.  Never send the player to limbo!

locations.name: inventory
locations.description: inventory, a place for items the player is carrying.  Never send the player to inventory!

locations.name: A long, sandy beach.
locations.description: You are on a long, sandy beach, which, under different circumstances, might feel idyllic, but right now seems lonely and desolate.  Ocean waves break hypnotically to the south. The beach continues to the west and east, and north leads straight into dense, dark jungle.

locations.name: Beach headland
locations.description: The beach leads up to a small rocky outcrop that could probably be described as a headland.

locations.name: Beach and trickling stream
locations.description: A small stream emerges from the jungle and meanders towards the ocean here.  The beach continues east and west, or you can follow the stream inland to the north.

locations.name: The eastern end of the beach.
locations.description: You reach the eastern end of the beach, where rocks and coral mark the space between you and a tiny island with a solitary palm tree.  The beach continues west, and there is a marshy patch of jungle to the north.

locations.name: Sharp rocks and corral
locations.description: The volcanic rock and corral here is razor sharp.  A tiny island lies to the east, and the main island lies west

locations.name: A tiny island
locations.description: You are on the tiny island, on a small patch of sandy beach.  To the east you can see garbage washed up onto the beach.  The island's solitary palm tree stands to the north.

locations.name: Jungle
locations.description: The jungle is dark and humid, with small creatures inhabiting the shadows.  The undergrowth is many layers deep, with logs and leaves rotting on the ground.

locations.name: Jungle Stream
locations.description: The stream trickles along the jungle floor, heading south towards the ocean.To the north you can see an old hut of some kind.  The stream opens out into a pool to the north-east, and the ground becomes marshy to the east.

locations.name: The Lone Palm
locations.description: A single palm tree towers above you, offering the tiniest amount of shade.  It looks like the tree is nurturing some coconuts.  The rest of the tiny island lies to the south and east.

locations.name: The end of the beach
locations.description: At the end of the beach, there is an old travel chest.  The beach to the south is covered in garbage.  A palm tree stands to the west.

locations.name: Tarnished beach
locations.description: The beautiful white sand is tarnished by a long line of garbage, washed up over many months.

items.name: herring
items.description: A small red fish.  It smells. It really smells.

items.name: treasure
items.description: Vast quantities of treasure - what more do you need to know?

items.name: torch
items.description: What a bright idea!  With this torch, you can really shine.

actions.msg: You can't possibly need help already?!
It's really dark... with a bit more light you might be able to look around.
You scan the room with the torch, and its light reveals vast amounts of shining treasure!
You make an awesome shadow puppet show.  If only there were other people around to see it.
You experience a moment of illumination.
Maybe you should look around to see what the torch has already revealed...
